Bear
This activity allows users to generate bear images with customized dimensions.
BearImageDatabase
The Room database class that represents the bear image database.
BearImageDetailsFragment
A fragment that displays details of a bear image, including width, height, and the image itself.
BearItemDao
Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the bear item entity in the database.
BearItemEntity
Entity class representing a bear item in the database.
BearItemRepository
Repository class that handles interactions with the bear image database and provides data to the ViewModel.
BearSavedImagesActivity
Activity for displaying saved bear images and handling user interactions.
CurrencyMainActivity
This activity serves as the main screen for a currency conversion app.
DataBindingTriggerClass
 
DeleteFragment
A fragment for deleting flight information from the application.
DetailsDeleteBinding
 
DetailsLayoutBinding
 
DetailsSaveBinding
 
fetchQuestion
An activity for displaying and answering a series of questions.
Flight
Entity class representing flight information.
FlightDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for interacting with flight data in the database.
FlightDatabase
Database class for managing flight data using the Room persistence library.
FlightDetailsFragment
Fragment for displaying flight details and allowing the user to save the flight.
FlightTracker
MainActivity class for the Flight Tracker app.
FlightTrackerBinding
 
FlightTrackerViewModel
ViewModel class for managing flight tracking data in the application.
FragmentBearDetailsBinding
 
History
Represents a historical currency conversion entry.
HistoryDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for interacting with the History table in the database.
HistoryDatabase
 
HistoryRoom
Activity displaying historical currency conversion entries.
InformationBinding
 
InputNameBinding
 
ItemBearImageBinding
 
ItemsLayoutBinding
 
ItemTopicBinding
 
MainActivity
The main entry point of the application that displays the main menu options.
MainActivityViewModel
 
MessageDetailsFragment
A fragment to display details of a selected message entry.
MyApplication
Custom Application class for initializing the ScoreDatabase instance.
MyBearAdapter
 
MyBearAdapter.OnItemClickListener
 
MyBearAdapter.OnItemLongClickListener
 
MyBearViewHolder
 
Question
Represents a question in the quiz, including the question text, options, and correct answer.
QuestionLookBinding
 
Score
Represents a player's score and associated information in the app.
ScoreActivity
Activity for displaying the user's score and handling interactions related to the score.
ScoreDao
 
ScoreDatabase
Database class that defines the Room database for storing scores.
Topic
Represents a topic that can be displayed in the app.
TopicClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on topics.
TopicsAdapter
Adapter class for displaying a list of topics in a RecyclerView.
TopicSelection
Activity for selecting a topic and fetching questions related to the selected topic.
TopicSelectionBinding
 
TopPlayersActivity
Activity for displaying the top players' scores in a ListView.
